def OnFINALIDADEValueChanged(view, entity): from Benner.Tecnologia.Common import FieldDefinition
if entity["FINALIDADE"].GetInt32() > 0 : view.FieldDefinitions["PROJETO"].DataAccessLevel = FieldDefinition.AccessLevel.Edit view.FieldDefinitions["CENTROCUSTO"].DataAccessLevel = FieldDefinition.AccessLevel.Edit view.FieldDefinitions["QUANTIDADE"].DataAccessLevel = FieldDefinition.AccessLevel.Edit view.FieldDefinitions["DATA"].DataAccessLevel = FieldDefinition.AccessLevel.Edit else : view.FieldDefinitions["PROJETO"].DataAccessLevel = FieldDefinition.AccessLevel.Read view.FieldDefinitions["CENTROCUSTO"].DataAccessLevel = FieldDefinition.AccessLevel.Read view.FieldDefinitions["QUANTIDADE"].DataAccessLevel = FieldDefinition.AccessLevel.Read view.FieldDefinitions["DATA"].DataAccessLevel = FieldDefinition.AccessLevel.Read
